connector.description: Periodically fetches a secured HTTP resource and provides the content as output.

camel.kamelet.http-secured-source.period.name: camel.kamelet.http-secured-source.period
camel.kamelet.http-secured-source.period.description: The interval between fetches in milliseconds

camel.kamelet.http-secured-source.conten.name: camel.kamelet.http-secured-source.contentType
camel.kamelet.http-secured-source.conten.description: The content type accepted for the resource

camel.kamelet.http-secured-source.url.name: camel.kamelet.http-secured-source.url
camel.kamelet.http-secured-source.url.description: The URL to fetch for data Example: https://gist.githubusercontent.com/nicolaferraro/e3c72ace3c751f9f88273896611ce5fe/raw/3b6f54060bacb56b6719b7386a4645cb59ad6cc1/quote.json

camel.kamelet.http-secured-source.authMe.name: camel.kamelet.http-secured-source.authMethod
camel.kamelet.http-secured-source.authMe.description: Authentication methods allowed to use as a comma separated list of values Basic, Digest or NTLM.

camel.kamelet.http-secured-source.authen.name: camel.kamelet.http-secured-source.authenticationPreemptive
camel.kamelet.http-secured-source.authen.description: If this option is true, camel-http sends preemptive basic authentication to the server.
